ygData.subject: RE: Lvls After Expansion Pak
ygData.msgSnippet: thanx mik.....that DOES answer part of my question.....I really hate people blowing smoke out of their asses in an answer ... From: Mikaela
ygData.messageBody:
thanx mik.....that DOES answer part of my question.....I really hate people
blowing smoke out of their asses in an answer

-----Original Message-----
From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 9:42 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Lvls After Expansion Pak


I am level 50 and have had my experience bars totally filled for weeks
now, and my screen since then still shows I gain exp when we kill a blue
or higher. And there is no change of color, all the bars look like they
do at any other level. Although I haven't died since I totally filled
all my bars at level 50, I know others who have and if they continued to
gain experience after filling them, they said they did not notice any
loss of exp until they died several times. So don't ask me WHERE the
exp is going, but apparently it is increasing past that 5th bar since
you can die and not see any exp loss.

Mik
